person_say: I didn't do well on my exam, and it's making me feel really discouraged. How can I regain my confidence?
animal_say: Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that! There's a wise bear named Bruno who can help you regain your confidence through mindfulness. Would you like to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds amazing! I would love to learn how mindfulness can help me regain my confidence.
animal_say: Great choice! Here comes Bruno, ready to help you find your calm and boost that confidence. Remember, slow and steady wins the race!
